# Mode 1 (Vendor driver)
- CH347OpenDevice(u32 interface)
Sends a vendor in request
    bRequest: 95
    wValue: 0x0000
    wIndex: 0
    wLength: 8
Response:
    0x40c118
This seems to be sent twice

- CH347SetTimeout()
Doesn't seem to send anything over USB

- CH347SPI_Init()
endpoint 6
    ca010001 Bulk out

ca1a 000000040100000000000000020000800007000000000000000000 bulk in, seems to match previous cfg other than 2nd nibble
iMode 0h-3h
       0h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       1h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 1 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       2h: c01a 000000040100000 2 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       3h: c01a 000000040100000 2 000 1 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000

iClock 0h-7h
       0h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       1h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 08 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       2h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 10 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       3h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 18 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       4h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 20 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       5h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 28 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       6h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 30 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       7h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 38 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000

iByteOrder 0h-7h
       0h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       1h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 0 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       2h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000

iSpiWriteReadInterval 0h-14h
       0h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0000 00 0 000000000
       1h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0100 00 0 000000000
       2h: c01a 000000040100000 0 000 0 000002 00 00 8 0000700 0200 00 0 000000000
